sentence.Network_en: Most of the ships were woefully short of ammunition.
sentence.Network_cn: 大多数舰船弹药极度匮乏。

sentence.Network_en: Public expenditure on the arts is woefully inadequate.
sentence.Network_cn: 艺术方面的公共支出严重不足。

sentence.Network_en: We are still woefully ignorant of the causes of this disease.
sentence.Network_cn: 不幸的是,我们仍对这种疾病的致病原因一无所知.

list.abs: but the other Sudanese , especially in the battered west marginal east , will once again find themselves woefully lacking in true representation .但是其他的苏丹人，尤其是那些饱受摧残的西部人和少数的东部人，迟早会再次发现他们不幸地失去了真正的地位。
he was sadly neglected ; it was woefully inadequate ., 他被忽略了 , 真可怜 ; 少得可怜.
Their own techniques was time woefully imperfect ., 当时 , 他们本身的技术也低得可怜.

teenage drivers have the highest motor vehicle crash and fatality rates of any demographic group , partly because they woefully underestimate driving risks .最新研究显示，摩托车撞车事故的发生及所导致的死亡之比率在青少年中最高，很大程度上是因为他们过于轻视驾车风险。

entry.tran: （人或事物）悲惨的，忧伤的，哀伤的
entry.def: If someone or something is woeful, they are very sad.

entry.tran: 恶劣的;糟糕的;不合意的
entry.def: You can use woeful to emphasize that something is very bad or undesirable.

example.ex: Such attitudes are the product of woeful ignorance.
example.tran: 这样的态度是极度无知造成的。

means.word_mean: 1. in an unfortunate or deplorable manner;

auth_sentence.content: Martin Kaymer has been woefully out of form all summer.
auth_sentence.res_content: Martin Kaymer has been woefully out of form all summer.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Martin Kaymer has been woefully out of form all summer.

auth_sentence.content: Sorry, but the punishment is woefully inadequate.

auth_sentence.content: But already these estimates appear woefully short.
auth_sentence.res_content: But already these estimates appear woefully short.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: But already these estimates appear woefully short.

sentences.en: United looked woefully short of menace in attack.
sentences.cn: 联队的进攻看上去一点威胁也没有。

sentences.en: We are still woefully ignorant of the causes of this disease.
sentences.cn: 不幸的是，我们仍对这种疾病的致病原因一无所知。
